feed.title: Mat's Blog-O-Matic - diy
feed.subtitle: A Linux, coding and DIY blog.

entry.title: Simple Hammer Repair
entry.summary: You may recall from my previous post about broken tools that I broke my favourite hammer by using the claw to break down what turned out to be some really sturdy cupboardry. In this post I document the manufacture of a new handle from scratch.

entry.title: Don't Know My Own Strength
entry.summary: Breaking cheap tools so you don't have to.
